**Kerdi Auto**

**Put your little green guys in our cars**

Kerdi (*Kerbal+Audi*) Auto is determined to help you make a more luxurious rover for your Kerbals. With a slow electricity recharge system installed in each of our car, you don't need to worry about running out of juice again.

Note: There is no safety features (such as airbags and seatbelts) installed in any of our cars, and we are not planning to. Put on stock wheels (or any wheel mod) and drive safe ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Needs a transparent pod setup, even if the IVA is a simple dummy IVA. Otherwise, not bad. Oh, and the wheels could be attached in the correct places so they're not floating.

In the upcoming Kerbal Foundries 1.9 beta release, I've included an MM patch that not only converts all the stock wheels to the new modules, but also adds stack nodes to all the wheels for more precise attachment. If you add stack nodes to the correct positions, the wheels can then be snapped into position properly. Something to think about for the future.
